forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Heavy snow this morning will taper off as a few snow showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Heavy snow this morning will transition to rain showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Low -3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with some snow showers this evening. A steady snow likely after midnight. Low 28F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will taper to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers around early. Clear skies later. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers around early. Clear skies later. Low 24F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 30F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 31F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning. Partial clearing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 32F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
